content:
Predict a prompt based on these prompts:a painting of the face of a true goddess.
 belenus  a sun god of the sky, he is often shown as a handsome man carrying a shining sun disc he is said to have brought warmth and light to the world, and is often associated with the healing arts.
 ceridwen  a goddess of wisdom and knowledge, she is often depicted as a crone or hag she is said to have brewed a magical cauldron of inspiration and knowledge, from which the legendary bard taliesin is said to have drunk.
 llew llaw gyffes  a sun god of the sky, he is often shown as a handsome man with golden hair and sunbeam rays emanating from his head he is said to have been cursed by his jealous mother arianrhod, and transformed into an owl.
 a goddess of war and wisdom, often portrayed as a brave and fearless warrior she is associated with strength, courage, and battle.
a pen sketch of the flower of the dead soul.
 a painting of the goddess hera by rossetti.

Predict a prompt based on these prompts:photorealistic paintingfigure head coming out of drain head, liminal space, oil on canvas, edward hopper vibe, oskar schlemmer gegenlicht, 2005,painting by andrea eitel.
 photorealistic painting clay figures with geometric bodies by miloslav chlup, oil on canvas, liminal space, edward hopper vibe, melancholic setting with realistic human.
 photorealistic painting clay figures with geometric bodies by miloslav chlup, oil on canvas, liminal space, edward hopper.
 photorealistic painting giant figure in minimalistic room by oskar schlemmer, oil on canvas, edward hopper vibe, melancholic setting with sideway point of view, realistic human with, pastel colors,malevich.
 photorealistic painting clay figures with geometric bodies by miloslav chlup, oil on canvas, liminal space, edward hopper,oskar schlemmer,picasso,salvador dali.
 photorealistic painting clay figures with geometric bodies by miloslav chlup, oil on canvas, liminal space, edward hopper, oskar schlemmer and picasso colab.
 photorealistic painting static figures across the complex elevator system room by oskar schlemmer, oil on canvas, edward hopper vibe, melancholic setting with sideway point of view, realistic human with sad expression, pastel colors.
photorealistic painting giant figure in multilevel construct room by oskar schlemmer, oil on canvas, edward hopper vibe, melancholic setting with sideway point of view, realistic human with sad expression, pastel colors.
